add-item.set-property:
Gift Wrap is available at a flat rate of {price} per order, which is applied during the checkout process. The Gift Wrap option includes a gift message that you can personalize during checkout.

Currently, the Gift Wrap option is only available for entire orders. Individual items within an order cannot be gift wrapped separately.

Q: Why wasn't the store promotion on the website available at the {storeName} store at my local mall?

A: The promotions posted on our website are offered in most of our stores nationwide. However, as noted when the promotion is posted on our website, each {storeName} store is unique and promotions are not offered at all stores. If you want to make sure your {storeName} store is running a particular promotion, call the store. If they aren''t running the promotion, they should be able to tell you which {storeName} store in your area is.
Q: What is your return policy?

A: If you have your receipt or packing slip, you can return any unused or defective item within 90 days of the original purchase date for a full refund, minus shipping costs. If you do not have a receipt or packing slip, you will receive a merchandise credit for the item's current selling price. Returns are not accepted after 90 days from the purchase date.
Q: How do I update my email address?

A: You can update your email address by logging in and selecting "My Profile." Make any changes you need to your profile, then scroll to the bottom of the page, and click "Submit" to save those changes.
Q: I created a Wish List on my last visit to the site. Where is it now?

A: You must be a registered member of {storeName} to save a Wish List for future access. Registered members can retrieve their Wish Lists by logging into their accounts and clicking Wish List at the top of any page on the website.
Q: How can I unsubscribe from your email list?

A: You can unsubscribe from {storeName} email by clicking the link at the bottom of marketing emails you receive from {storeName}. Please note, even if you elect not to receive email, or subsequently ask to be removed from the {storeName} email marketing list, you may still receive email confirmations for Gift Card purchases made on our website, confirmations of our receipt of questions submitted, and other operational emails. You can also login and edit your profile, then deselect the box for "Send me emails."

Ground Shipping

UPS will deliver items that are available for immediate shipment
in 3-5 business days at the rates described below. Please note
that delivery of merchandise that requires special handling
will take approximately two additional weeks.

For orders up to $14.99 US, the shipping rate is $4.75 US.
For orders of $15 - $49.99 US, the shipping rate is $5.95 US.
For orders of $50.00 US or more, the shipping rate is $6.50 US.

Two Day Shipping

UPS will deliver items that are available for immediate shipment
in two business days at a flat rate of $9.50 US.

Next Day Shipping

UPS will deliver items that are available for immediate shipment
overnight at a flat rate of $18.95 US.

Ground Shipping

UPS will deliver items that are available for immediate shipment
in 3-5 business days at the rates described below. Please note
that delivery of merchandise that requires any special handling
will take approximately two additional weeks.

For Orders up to 14.99 € the Shipping Rate is 4.75 €.
For Orders from 15 €- 49.99 € the Shipping Rate is 5.95 €.
For Orders 50.00 € and up the Shipping Rate is 6.50 €.

If you have your receipt or packing slip, you can return any unused or defective item within 90 days of the original purchase date for a full refund, minus shipping costs. If you do not have a receipt or packing slip, you will receive a merchandise credit for the item's current selling price. Returns are not accepted after 90 days from the purchase date.

{storeName} is the premier stylish, fashion brand for women and men, completely driven by original design. Each season, {storeName} develops carefully edited collections of high quality fashion, wear-to-work and casual wear for young men and women. From the product to the store experience, the {storeName} brand is a fashion leader.

{storeName} is the premier source for quality home furniture and related products, completely driven by functional design. Each season, {storeName} carefully evaluates furniture manufacturers seeking the highest quality products available. From the kitchen to the living room, {storeName} is a leader in quality and exceptional value.

Be the First to shop our new Home Collection, featuring the {storeName} styles you love, designed to fit your lifestyle perfectly! Make sure to sign up for our Email Newsletter to be informed of this and other new offerings and promotions!
{storeName} Names Jessica Zakszewski as Chief Marketing Officer
Click here to visit our corporate site.
{storeName} is looking for individuals to join our team. We want people like you: genuine, hard-working, and passionate about the {storeName} brand. {storeName} is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

{storeName} takes a people-first approach to our benefits program. We are proud to offer one of the most competitive benefits packages in the retail industry. Here's a quick overview of the benefits {storeName} employees receive
All this, and countless other benefits, await you in your career with {storeName}!

Welcome to the {storeName} Web Site ("Site"). Please review the following basic terms that govern your use of our Site. Please note that your use of our Site constitutes your agreement to follow and be bound by those terms (the "Agreement").

Unless otherwise noted, all materials, including images, illustrations, designs, icons, photographs, video clips, and written and other materials that appear as part of this Site (collectively, the "Contents") are copyrights, trademarks, trade dress and/or other intellectual properties owned, controlled or licensed by {storeName}, and its subsidiaries and/or affiliates. The Site as a whole is protected by copyright and trade dress, all worldwide rights, titles and interests in and to which are owned by {storeName}, {storeName} Foundation and all other trademarks appearing at this Site are trademarks of {storeName}. and its subsidiaries.

The Contents of our Site, and the Site as a whole, are intended solely for personal, noncommercial use by the users of our Site. You may download or copy the Contents and other downloadable materials displayed on the Site for your personal use only. No right, title or interest in any downloaded materials or software is transferred to you as a result of any such downloading or copying. You may not reproduce (except as noted above), publish, transmit, distribute, display, modify, create derivative works from, sell or participate in any sale of, or exploit in any way, in whole or in part, any of the Contents, the Site, or any related software.
User Comments, Feedback, Postcards and Other Submissions

All comments, feedback, postcards, suggestions, ideas, and other submissions disclosed, submitted or offered to {storeName} on or by this Site or otherwise disclosed, submitted or offered in connection with your use of this Site (collectively, "Comments") shall be and remain {storeName}''s property. Such disclosure, submission or offer of any Comments shall constitute an assignment to {storeName} of all worldwide rights, titles and interests in all copyrights and other intellectual properties in the Comments. Thus, {storeName} will own exclusively all such rights, titles and interests and shall not be limited in any way in its use, commercial or otherwise, of any Comments. {storeName} is and shall be under no obligation (1) to maintain any Comments in confidence; (2) to pay to user any compensation for any Comments; or (3) to respond to any user Comments.

You agree that no Comments submitted by you to the Site will violate any right of any third party, including copyright, trademark, privacy or other personal or proprietary right(s). You further agree that no Comments submitted by you to the Site will be or contain libelous or otherwise unlawful, abusive or obscene material. You are and shall remain solely responsible for the content of any Comments you make.
We may from time to time change the terms that govern your use of our Site. Your use of our Site following any such change constitutes your agreement to follow and be bound by the terms as changed.
We may change, move or delete portions of, or may add to, our Site from time to time.

From time to time there may be information on {storeName} that contains typographical errors, inaccuracies, or omissions. We reserve the right to correct any errors, inaccuracies or omissions and to change or update information at any time without prior notice. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you.

To the extent that this Site contains links to outside services and resources, the availability and content of which {storeName} does not control, any concerns regarding any such service or resource, or any link thereto, should be directed to the particular outside service or resource.

THIS SITE AND ALL CONTENTS OF THE SITE ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" BASIS WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION WARRANTIES OF TITLE OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE, BY YOUR USE OF THE SITE, THAT YOUR USE OF THE SITE IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK, THAT YOU ASSUME FULL RESPONSIBILITY FOR ALL COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH ALL NECESSARY SERVICING OR REPAIRS OF ANY EQUIPMENT YOU USE IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE OF OUR SITE, AND THAT {storeName} SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES OF ANY KIND RELATED TO YOUR USE OF THIS SITE.

This Site is controlled and operated by {storeName} from its offices in Seattle, WA. This Agreement shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Washington, without regard to any conflict of law provisions. Any dispute arising under this Agreement shall be resolved exclusively by the state and federal courts of the State of Washington.

This Agreement is effective unless and until terminated by either you or {storeName}. You may terminate this Agreement at any time. {storeName} also may terminate this Agreement at any time and may do so immediately without notice, and accordingly deny you access to the Site, if in {storeName}''s sole discretion you fail to comply with any term or provision of this Agreement. Upon any termination of this Agreement by either you or {storeName}, you must promptly destroy all materials downloaded or otherwise obtained from this Site, as well as all copies of such materials, whether made under the terms of this Agreement or otherwise.

At {storeName}, we respect the privacy of all visitors who access and use our Web site. The information we collect on this site is used to understand how we can enhance our site and improve your experience. This policy describes the limited circumstances in which we collect personal information, why we collect it, and how we use it. Our policy also describes the choices you can make about how we collect and use your information.

If our information practices change in the future, we will post an updated policy on this Web site. You can tell if the policy has changed by checking the revision date that appears at the end of this policy.

{storeName} Introduces Men's Apparel

{storeName} announces that it now sells men's apparel. Be the first to shop the new Men's Apparel category, featuring the {storeName} styles you love, designed to fit your lifestyle perfectly!

{storeName} Introduces Men's Apparel

{storeName} announced that it has introduced a Men's Apparel category to its site. Be the first to shop the new Men's Apparel Category, featuring the {storeName} styles you love, designed to fit your lifestyle perfectly!

Introducing Gift Ideas category!

{storeName} announced that it has introduced a Gift Ideas category to its site. Be the first to shop the new Gift Ideas Category, featuring choice Electronics and Glassware products in the styles you love, designed to fit your lifestyle perfectly!

{storeName} Names Jessica Zakszewski Chief Marketing Officer

{storeName} announces the appointment of Jessica Zakszewski as Chief Marketing Officer. Zakszewski joins {storeName} with more than 18 years of marketing experience with various retailers.
